rentals.name: Unitree Go2 Pro
rentals.description: Professional-grade quadruped robot dog rental for demos, R&D pilots, inspections, and events.

rentals.name: Unitree Go2 X (Tracked)
rentals.description: Tracked Go2 platform optimized for harsh terrain and high-traction environments.

rentals.name: Unitree G1 Basic
rentals.description: Compact humanoid research platform for embodied AI demos and lab pilots.

rentals.name: Unitree G1 EDU Ultimate A
rentals.description: Advanced humanoid platform with dexterous hands and Jetson Orin compute.

rentals.name: Unitree R1 Air
rentals.description: Ultra-light humanoid robot for education demos and light R&D.

rentals.name: Unitree R1 Standard
rentals.description: Enhanced humanoid robot for demos and short research pilots.

rentals.name: Unitree H1-2
rentals.description: Full-size humanoid robot for enterprise R&D and autonomy pilots.

rentals.name: Unitree R1 EDU Standard (Rental)
rentals.Description: Rental listing for R1 EDU Standard for university courses, research pilots, and demos in controlled environments (often includes UAIS support).
rentals.Features: Expanded DOF; ROS2 + SDK; education tooling; depth vision; removable battery.
rentals.Specs: ~25–27 kg; DOF ~30; compute ~40 TOPS; runtime ~1–2 hrs; vision + IMU sensors.

rentals.name: Unitree H1 Robotic Humanoid (Rental)
rentals.Description: Rental listing for Unitree H1 for advanced humanoid demos, R&D evaluation, and enterprise showcases; typically requires trained operator and safety plan.
rentals.Features: Dynamic bipedal locomotion; 3D LiDAR + depth camera perception; high-torque joints; dual compute options; ROS2 & SDK support; removable battery system
rentals.Specs: Height ~180 cm; Weight ~47 kg; Battery ~864 Wh (15 Ah) removable; Runtime ~1–2 hr; Arms DOF ~4 each; Legs DOF ~5 each; Max speed ~3.3 m/s; Peak joint torque up to ~360 N·m
rentals.Intended Use Disclaimer: Advanced humanoid R&D and enterprise demos
rentals.Liability Disclaimer: Safety protocols required; user assumes risk

rentals.name: Nova KUKA Industrial Robot Rental
rentals.Short Description: Industrial robotics unit rental for events
rentals.Description: Industrial robot rental offering from Nova Tech Innovations for event automation, robotic performances, DJ shows, robot bars, and custom kinetic installations. Includes production support, operator services, and safety compliance.
rentals.Features:
• Industrial KUKA robot units with motion control
• Custom choreography & programming
• On-site operator and safety technician
• Integrated kinetic lighting and performance enhancements
rentals.Specs: Depends on robot model & configuration; typically **KUKA industrial arm or articulated robot** with event programming
rentals.Intended Use Disclaimer: Event use only; licensed operator required
rentals.Liability Disclaimer: User assumes risk; comply with venue and safety laws

rentals.name: OpenMind BrainPack (Rental)
rentals.Description: BrainPack is a modular autonomy hardware and software system that adds high-performance perception, mapping, semantic understanding, privacy vision, and self-charging capabilities to third-party robots. It’s powered by NVIDIA Jetson Thor and runs OpenMind’s OM1 AI robot OS.
rentals.Features: Jetson Thor-based high-performance compute; 3D spatial mapping and real-time scene reconstruction; auto object labeling & semantic memory; privacy-first vision with human detection/blurring; remote video and control; self-docking charging; OM1 + FABRIC integration for coordinated robot context sharing.
rentals.Specs: Compute module: NVIDIA Jetson Thor processor; integrated LiDAR/depth sensors; high-bandwidth vision/IMU inputs; real-time spatial mapping; privacy vision stack; 5+ sensor fusion pipeline; edge AI runtime (OM1). Deployable on humanoids, quadrupeds, and other mobile platforms.
rentals.Insurance Required: Research, demos, autonomy pilots; supervised deployments
rentals.Intended Use Disclaimer: User assumes risk; privacy and safety compliance required

rentals.name: Autonomous Airport Robotics System
rentals.description: Autonomous robotic systems for airport cleaning, security patrol, baggage handling, and passenger assistance in modern airport terminals.

rentals.name: Retail Robotics Systems
rentals.description: Autonomous robotic systems designed for retail environments to support inventory management, store operations, customer assistance, security, and fulfillment.

rentals.name: Manufacturing & Industrial Robotics Systems
rentals.description: Autonomous and collaborative robotic systems designed for modern manufacturing environments to support assembly, welding, machine tending, material handling, quality inspection, and intralogistics.

rentals.name: Restaurant Runner Robot
rentals.description: Autonomous indoor runner robot designed for restaurants to transport dishes between kitchen and dining areas, reduce labor dependency, improve service speed, and support front-of-house staff during every shift.
features: On-robot display for promotions and specials
Guest engagement and viral marketing appeal

rentals.name: Hospitality Robotics Systems
rentals.description: Autonomous robotic systems designed for hospitality environments to support guest services, housekeeping, food delivery, and operational support in hotels and restaurants.

rentals.name: Healthcare Robotics Systems
rentals.description: Autonomous robotic systems designed for healthcare environments to support patient care, hospital operations, sanitation, medication handling, monitoring, and logistics.

rentals.name: Warehouse Robotics & Logistics Automation Systems
rentals.description: Autonomous robotic systems designed for warehouse and logistics environments to support picking, storage, palletizing, sorting, packaging, inventory scanning, and yard operations.

services.name: UAIS Robot Repair (SF Bay Area)
services.Description: Comprehensive hardware & software repair, calibration, and preventive maintenance services for robots and autonomous systems in the SF Bay Area. Covers quadrupeds, humanoids, mobile platforms, and autonomy modules.
services.Features: On-site diagnostics; component replacement; firmware & control software re-flash; sensor calibration; actuator servicing; preventive checkups; emergency support
services.Specs: Repairs: structural, electrical, firmware, sensors, actuators; Diagnostics: software logs & hardware tests; Calibration: LiDAR, IMU, vision stacks; Preventive Maintenance Packages
services.Intended Use Disclaimer: Service offered for research, demos, field deployment; client must ensure safe environment
services.Liability Disclaimer: Client assumes risk; follow UAIS safety protocols

services.name: UAIS Robot Repair (Los Angeles)
services.Description: Comprehensive hardware & software repair, calibration, and preventive maintenance services for robots and autonomous systems in the Los Angeles area. Covers quadrupeds, humanoids, mobile platforms, and autonomy modules.
services.Features: On-site diagnostics; component replacement; firmware & control software re-flash; sensor calibration; actuator servicing; preventive checkups; emergency support
services.Specs: Repairs: structural, electrical, firmware, sensors, actuators; Diagnostics: software logs & hardware tests; Calibration: LiDAR, IMU, vision stacks; Preventive Maintenance Packages
services.Intended Use Disclaimer: Offered for labs, CES demos, field deployments; client must ensure safe environment
services.Liability Disclaimer: Client assumes risk; follow UAIS safety protocols

accessories_addons.name: AI Facial Recognition SDK
accessories_addons.Description: AI software module that detects and identifies human faces in camera feeds, optimized for real-time edge deployment with compact model footprint and cross-platform compatibility.
accessories_addons.Features: High accuracy face detection & matching; tunable confidence thresholds; optimized for low-power edge processors; supports model customization.
accessories_addons.Specs: Edge deployable SDK; model size & performance optimized; real-time inference; low latency; multi-platform support.
